entry.title: Epiphany
entry.summary:
Author: Buddieproof

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 918Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 2

Summary: Eddie Diaz has spent his whole life following the rules—doing what’s expected, being the perfect soldier, the perfect father, the perfect man. But after years of relationships that felt like going through the motions, a quiet realization begins to creep in. His low sex drive, his lack of connection in past relationships—it was never about him being broken. He just hadn’t been with the right person.And that person has been in front of him all along.Buck.Now, with the truth staring him in the face, Eddie is forced to confront everything he thought he knew about himself. But realizing his feelings is just the first step—acting on them? That’s another battle entirely.Because how do you tell your best friend that he’s the reason you feel alive for the first time in your life?

entry.title: The Heartguard
entry.summary:
Author: Excalipurr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,613Chapters: 7/15Kudos: 452

Summary: “Are you sure you’re six feet? You look small”It wasn’t worth attempting to convince him otherwise, Eddie knew the type. Eddie had served with the type.“Maybe you’re just big”Surprise flashed across his client’s face for a split second before he schooled it back to mild annoyance.“Look, Díaz-”“It’s Eddie”“Whatever. My father” and he said that with a degree of aversion, “has tried this countless times, so-”“Four times” Eddie corrected, which earned him a glare, and kept on, “In six months. Pretty impressive”“Thank you. I also think so. Anyway-”or the bodyguard AU

entry.title: Hard to Love (But I Love That You Love Me Good)
entry.summary:
Author: kikibridges13

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,220Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 320

Summary: The Buckley parents crash Maddie and Chimney's baby shower. It goes as well as you expect it to.**"Well," Margaret sniffed after taking another long drink from her glass, "Evan gave away the rights to the child he helped bring into the world already.""I didn't have any rights, Mom," Buck replied through gritted teeth. "I just helped out a couple of friends who wanted to be parents.""And besides," Margaret continued, as though Buck hadn't spoken, "with his new...romantic preferences, it would be impossible.""What the hell is that supposed to mean?" Buck asked, voice raised."There are other ways to have a child, Mom," Maddie said. "It's 2025, for Christ's sake.""Still," their mother huffed, picking up the wine glass in front of her, "Evan can't keep a relationship longer than 6 months. Maybe if he wasn't so hard to love, he could keep somebody that actually wanted him."

entry.title: The Bolter
entry.summary:
Author: Jack3402

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,255Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 306

Summary: From a very young age, Evan Buckley knew he would end up alone.After Eddie leaves to go after Chris, Buck knows that he needs to get out of Los Angeles for a while. He travels just like he did before he joined the 118, looking for a reason to keep going after losing the family he thought would finally stay.Eddie moves to Texas and slowly but surely gains the trust of his son back. After 4 long months of long conversations and hard realizations, Christopher finally wants to move back to Los Angeles.But what happens when they return and Buck is nowhere to be found, and nobody but Maddie is able to get in contact with him? What happens when Eddie finds out just how badly he hurt the love of his life, and now he can't tell him just how much he truly needs him to be okay?

entry.title: Made Your Mark On Me
entry.summary:
Author: milowren

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,767Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 510

Summary: Do you love him? Before Buck’s mind can formulate the undeniable answer in words, a burning sensation engulfs his forearm. For a split, irrational second, he thinks maybe he’s having a heart attack — but no, it’s the wrong arm, and the pain is too low anyway. He races over to his kitchen sink, planning to douse the flames in cold water, but when he looks down, he almost does have a heart attack.Because there are two black bands maybe half an inch apart circling his forearm just below his elbow. Two black bands that definitely weren’t there when he left Eddie’s house fifteen minutes earlier.“No,” Buck whispers, staring down at his arm in something like horror. “Oh, no.”Because there’s only one thing it could be.His soulmark. *** In a world where your soulmark only shows up when you realize you're in love with your soulmate, Buck's appears at the worst possible time.Or season 8b spec, soulmates edition!

entry.title: when you're young (like that)
entry.summary:
Author: mxrrorbcll

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,036Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 279

Summary: “Do you think they’d let me honk the horn?” Everything was finished with their work here - snacks bought, gas pumped - reasonably, he should’ve gotten Chris into the truck and headed on. “They’re inside, bud. We don’t know how long they’ll be, and -” The universe didn’t scream, but it did seem to have a funny way of laughing in Eddie’s face. Before he could finish his sentence, the door of the store was opening again and the gaggle of firefighters were making their way over. He could hear their chatter, watched as the one with a backwards hat tossed a piece of candy in the air and caught it in his mouth, only to be met with a laugh. “Please, Dad?” pre-season 2, eddie and chris run into the 118 at a gas station.(or, I saw a tiktok of a kid and firefighters honking a horn at a gas station and was inspired)
